title.rendered: Tuya Artisan Fire Bowl listed as Modern Master in Connecticut Cottages and Gardens

content.rendered:
In the May 2016 issue of Connecticut Cottages and Gardens, a silhouette of the Tuya Artisan Fire Bowl is featured in the “Spring Into Summer: Modern Masters” article. The fire bowl is showcased among other patio furniture described as “On-trend furnishings designed for relaxing and entertaining.”

The editor describes the fire bowl and states, “Fire up the 65,000 BTU gas burner of the Tuya [Artisan] Fire Bowl from Eldorado Stone, crafted from glass-fiber reinforced concrete, resembling natural stone.” The feature can be found on pages 58-59.

Connecticut Cottages and Gardens is a regional publication offered to residents of Connecticut’s affluent residential areas.

See more details about the Tuya Artisan Fire Bowl here.
